projectInstructions: When sorting, default to 'Name: A to Z' rather than 'Default'
When fixing images, never use ImageFallBack.js
When making changes, never push to git until explicitly instructed
The site is hosted on Netlify which auto-deploys from git main branch
The development workflow is: develop on 'development' branch, then merge to 'main' for deployment
aiContext.projectContext: An e-commerce plant store with focus on user experience and mobile responsiveness.
